item.title: When Great Leaders Refuse to Say ‘We,’ Backed by Science
item.description: Sometimes, “I” is the right approach, especially when you need to take responsibility.

item.title: How Moët Hennessy Retains Icon Status While Capturing the Next Generation
item.description: The company’s recently appointed North American president and CEO shares how the brand builds for the future while honoring the past.

item.title: How Feetures Became a Cult Running Brand By Giving Away Its Socks for Free
item.description: Over the past 23 years, the Gaither family has scaled their sock company to more than $50 million in annual revenue.

item.title: 3 Smart Ways to Use Fractional Leaders in Your Business
item.description: Looking to hire a fractional CFO, COO, or CMO? Here’s how to get the most out of the arrangement.

item.title: Why Helping Your Neurodivergent Workers Will Help Your Business
item.description: Neurodiverse workers may have specific skills your company really needs.
